languages.text: {n}Маражай прищуривает один глаз.{/n} "Хочешь знать, как и зачем я устроил все это, {name}? Спрашивай".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай прищуривает один глаз.{/n} "Хочешь знать, как и зачем я устроил все это, {name}? Спрашивай".
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra un ojo.{/n} «¿Quieres saber cómo y por qué he tramado todo esto, {name}? Adelante, pregunta».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra un ojo.{/n} «¿Quieres saber cómo y por qué he tramado todo esto, {name}? Adelante, pregunta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了一只眼睛。{/n}“你想知道我是如何策划了这一切，又是为了什么，对不对，{name}？尽管问吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋眯起了一只眼睛。{/n}“你想知道我是如何策划了这一切，又是为了什么，对不对，{name}？尽管问吧。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは片目を細めた。{/n}「俺がどんな風に何の目的で仕組んだのかを知りたいのか、{name}？聞きたいことを言ってみろ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは片目を細めた。{/n}「俺がどんな風に何の目的で仕組んだのかを知りたいのか、{name}？聞きたいことを言ってみろ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse un œil.{/n} « Vous voulez savoir comment et dans quel but j'ai orchestré cette opération, {name} ? Posez vos questions, je vous écoute. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse un œil.{/n} « Vous voulez savoir comment et dans quel but j'ai orchestré cette opération, {name} ? Posez vos questions, je vous écoute. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kneift ein Auge zusammen.{/n} "Ihr wollt wissen, wie und zu welchem Zweck ich all das eingefädelt habe, {name}? Stellt Eure Fragen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, {name}? Ask your questions."

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai narrows one eye.{/n} "You want to know how and to what end I orchestrated all of this, ? Ask your questions."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai bir gözünü kısıyor.{/n} "Tüm bunları neden ve hangi amaçla yaptığımı mı merak ediyorsun {name}? Sor o hâlde."
